title: LCK --- No Way
body:
Anyone else not liking the LCK moniker Riot has come up with. I miss OGN and think if they wanted to take it over they could have come up with something better than this. :( 

Anyone have any better ideas?

replies.body: i still call it OGN, its easier. otherwise they couldve just called it LCS KR. id be okay with that instead.
